message.raw:
Modified The pulseblaster to use Hz as the Base Unit (will mess up your front panel values by 10^6, so be warned!!)

Changed the number of decimal places to display (this is a little messy, since it may limit the precision you can specify on the front panel if you don't use Base units...will look into a nicer fix)

Made the Pulseblaster and novatechdds9m classes use the BLACS_connection column in the connection table instead of parameters being hardcoded in main.pyw!
